    (∃ a : ℕ → ℝ, (∀ i, a i ≠ 0) ∧
      (∀ n ≥ 1, (∑ i ∈ Finset.Iic n, a i • X ^ i : Polynomial ℝ).roots.toFinset.card = n)) ↔
    putnam_1990_b5_solution := by
  have step1 : (∃ a : ℕ → ℝ, (∀ i, a i ≠ 0) ∧ (∀ n ≥ 1, (∑ i ∈ Finset.Iic n, a i • X ^ i : Polynomial ℝ).roots.toFinset.card = n)) → putnam_1990_b5_solution := by
